* District 4


District 4
==========

District 4 – Ron Garland
[View District 4 Map](https://georgetowntexas.gov/Documents/Government/City%20Council/District%204/CouncilDistrict4_Esize.pdf?t=202407081109070)

**Phone:**
512-930-3651
**Email:**
[ron.garland@georgetowntexas.gov](mailto:ron.garland@georgetowntexas.gov)
1st Term
**Term Expires:**
May 2028
![photo: Ron Garland inside the Georgetown city council chambers](https://georgetowntexas.gov/Images/Government/City%20Council/District%204/Ron%20Garland%202.jpg?t=202508061718030)

Retired in 2009 after 39 year career with Boy Scouts of America.

Eastern Hills High School, Ft. Worth
Texas Tech  1965-66
Graduate of University of Texas Arlington, 1970

##### **City Boards and Commissions**

Current Member of Water Utility Advisory Board
City Representative for the Capital Area Council of Governments (CAPCOG)
Former member of Georgetown Ethics Commission
Former Chair of 2021 Mobility Bond team

Two children, and six grandchildren
50 year member of Rotary International

* Strategic planning for the City

With the approval of HB 1082 in May 2021, all elected officials' personal information is to be redacted from any public documents.
[View redacted campaign finance and expense reports through the City Secretary Records.](https://www.georgetowntexas.gov/government/secretarys_office/locate_city_records.php)
